200.description: Success. The session ID is returned in a cookie named `laravel_session`. You need to include this cookie in subsequent requests.

schema.example: laravel_session=eyJpdiI6IjZKZm...%3D; Path=/; Domain=localhost; HttpOnly; Expires=Fri, 18 Nov 2022 13:25:26 GMT;
